name: Audrey Gaines
title: Budtender
coverLetter: Hello my name is Audrey and I am 21 years old. Working in the cannabias industry is not only my passion but I wanna grow and gain more knowledge and experience in this industry. It is my goal to help every patient find the right medicine for them. I wanna make sure every single patient leaves satisfied and with a smile!
experience:

Dec 12, 2016- May 31, 2017
Budtender/Receptionist
-Save Greens

Manager
additionalInfo: I have 5 months of manager experience, managing budtenders and I know how to properly do inventory and keep track of the income through a pos system.
